name: Karolyn GIVENS, et al., Petitioners v. MOUNTAIN VALLEY PIPELINE, LLC
name_abbreviation: Givens v. Mountain Valley Pipeline, LLC

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Karolyn GIVENS, et al., Petitioners
v.

attorneys: Motion of The Niskanen Center for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Karolyn GIVENS, et al., Petitioners
v.
MOUNTAIN VALLEY PIPELINE, LLC
No. 19-54
Supreme Court of the United States.
October 7, 2019
Motion of The Niskanen Center for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
